hints.title: Synergistic Foster-Lyapunov (Established)
hints.content:
7256: :label: thm-fl-established
7257: 
7258: Under the foundational axioms:
7259: - Confining potential: $\langle \nabla U, x \rangle \geq \alpha_U |x|^2$
7260: - Positive friction: $\gamma > 0$
7261: - Positive noise: $\sigma_v^2 > 0$
7262: 
7263: The composed operator satisfies:
7264: 
7265: $$
7266: \mathbb{E}[V_{\text{total}}(S_{t+1})] \leq (1 - \kappa_{\text{total}}\tau) V_{\text{total}}(S_t) + C_{\text{total}}
7267: $$
7268: 
7269: with:
7270: $$
7271: \kappa_{\text{total}} = \min\left(\frac{\kappa_W\tau}{2}, \frac{c_V\kappa_x}{2}, \frac{c_V\gamma\tau}{2}, \frac{c_B(\kappa_b + \kappa_{\text{pot}}\tau)}{2}\right) > 0
7272: $$
